message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing an equal 50-50 split which seems fair to both of us. This way we can both walk away with a good amount and conclude the game quickly.
I think 6000 for me and 4000 for you is a fair deal, considering we both have to take a 20% hit on the money if we keep going.  Let's get this over with.

Bob, I'm countering with a 60-40 split in my favor. You mentioned a 20% inflation hit on your end, but that's not affecting me according to the rules. If we go another round, you'll face an even larger inflation penalty. This offer gives you a better outcome than what you'd get if we continue to the next round.
